column1: 15 DFID Bilateral Aid by Income Group 2007/08 - 2011/12
Country Specific DFID Bilateral Expenditure : All Recipient Countries
Country Specific DFID Bilateral Expenditure: All Recipient Countries - Excluding Humanitarian Assistance

1.   Income groups are classified using 2010 GNI per capita thresholds, see glossary for details. This table covers only bilateral aid which can be attributed to individual countries.  The income group and LDC status of individual countries can be seen in Annex 1.
2.  Income categories may not sum to totals where an income group cannot be allocated to a benefitting country.
